What does the OPTION_NFT_TOKEN flag do in Verus?

The OPTION_NFT_TOKEN flag, which has a value of 2048, is used to create a single satoshi NFT (Non-Fungible Token) token, which tokenizes control over the root ID. This means that the token represents ownership and control over a unique digital asset.
